Steps.Description: Stealth Rock (use Flamethrower vs Hydreigon);
if it stays, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure;
if it still stays: 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock (use Flamethrower vs Hydreigon);
if it stays, siwtch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Low kick;
and you get a Focus Sash, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get a Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock;
if you get a Leftovers, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get a Sitrus Berry, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Gliscor, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Jellicent, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. When Kingambit comes out, switch into Poliwrath and use Drain Punch.
Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Flamethrower vs Hydreigon).
If it switches into Hydreigon, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch into Blissey;
if it uses Fire Blast;
and it deals around 19.4-23% of damage, use Trick;
if it switche sinto Absol, switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Eelektross, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
if it switches into Lucario, switch into Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and it deals 29.1-34.4% damage, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Flamethrower or it switches out into Umbreon, switch into Metagross;
if it switches out into Dragonite, use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Eelektross, use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Toxicroak, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into anything else, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Dragonite, switch into Metagross;
if it uses Dragon Claw, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Flamethrower, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Superpower, use Trick;
if you get a Leftovers, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get a Sitrus Berry, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Toxicroak, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Eelektross, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, use Stealth Rock;
if it got damaged by Life Orb, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x
if not, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Dragon Claw, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Fire Punch, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches unto Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock, then switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
Use Trick;
If it stays, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure, then switch into Excadrill and kill it with Earthquake. Switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
Use Trick, then switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Switch into Chandelure;
If it uses Fire Blast, switch into Blissey, then switch into Metagross;
if it switches into Absol, use Stelath Rock;
If it stays, switch back into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch again into Chandelure;
if it still stays: 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If Hydreigon comes out, swithc back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Flamethrower, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Chandelure, switch into Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed (use Earthquake vs Umbreon).
Use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure. Switch into Excadrill and use Earthquake. Switch back into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
Use Trick;
If it uses Aura Sphere;
and you get a Focus Sash, switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed. Use Flamethrower vs Hydreigon.
If it switches into Hydreigon, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get a Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Close Combat, switch into Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Dragonite or Eelektross, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
If it switches into Hydreigon, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure;
If it stays: 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Hydreigon: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch into Blissey, then use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. When Kingambit comes out, switch into Poliwrath and use Drain Punch.
Use Trick;
If it switches into Golurk, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Hydreigon, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock;
If you get a Chesto Berry, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If you get a Leftovers, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
If it switches into Eelektross, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Excadrill and use Earthquake. Switch into Chadenlur Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
If it switches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock;
If it stays, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into anything else, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch into Blissey, then switch into Metagross;
If it switches into Lucario, use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Toxicroak, use Stealth Rock;
If it stays, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into anything else, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch into Blissey, then switch into Metagross Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Close Combat, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Salamence, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Low Kick;
and you get an Air Balloon, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get a Focus Sash or Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Night Slash, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it uses Thunder Wave, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Garchomp;
and you get a Life Orb, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches out into Gyarados, switch into Poliwrath, then switch into second Metagross and use Thunder Punch to kill. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get a Rocky Helmet, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Krookodile, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches out into Mismagius, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches out into Serperior, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it switches out into Staraptor, switch into Blissey and tank Final Gambit. Switch into Chandelure, then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Switch into Blissey;
If it gets damaged by Life Orb, use Stealth Rock;
If it switches into Garchomp, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Honchkrow, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Thunder Punch. Switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance.
If it switches into Staraptor, switch into Chadndelur 3x Calm Mind + X.Defend + X.Speed.
If it uses any move other than Fire Blast but doesn't get damaged by Life Orb, use Trick;
If it switches into Bisharp or Samurott, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it switches into Garchomp, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock as it sends out Gyarados. Switch into Poliwrath, then switch into Metagross and use Thunder Punch to kill. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Haxorus, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Fire Blast but doesn't get damaged by Life Orb or it missed, use Stealth Rock;
If it switches into Bisharp or Samurott, switch into Chandelure then switch into Metagross and use Trick.
If it uses Aqua Tail, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it uses Sacred Sword, swithc into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Garchomp or Haxorus, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Honchkrows, switch into Metagross and use Thunder Punch. switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance.
If it switches into Staraptor, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Defend + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it stays, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches out into Crobat, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Garchomp, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If you get a Life Orb, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches out into Gyarados, switch into Poliwrath, then switch into second Metagross and use Thunder Punch to kill;
If Metagross HP is below 60%, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandeur 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Chandelure switch into your own Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If you get Rocky Helmet, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Thunder Punch to kill. Switch into Blissey, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch into Blissey;
If it stays, switch into Metagross and use Thunder Punch. Switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance.
If it swiches into Krookodile, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance.
Switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switc into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Waterfall, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Krookodile, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance.
Switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill: Stealt Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Gyarados, switch into Poliwrath, then switch into Metagross and use Thunder Punch;
If Metagross HP is higher than 60%, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If Metagross HP is lower than 60%, switch into Blissey, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock;
If it uses Superpower, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Thunderbolt, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Salamence, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Flamethrower, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses any other move, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Tyranitar, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Bisharp, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Serperior, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Garchomp, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Gliscor, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Samurott, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Salamence, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Serperior, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Aqua Tail, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Serperior, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Megahorn, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Dragonite, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Sharpedo, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Serperior, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it sends out Kingambit last, switch into Poliwrath and use Drain Punch.
Switch into Chandelure;
If it uses Foul Play, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses High Jump Kick, X. Special + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Switch into Blissey;
If it uses Foul Play, use Stealth Rock;
If it switches out into Garchomp, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Staraptor, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend.
If it uses Will-o-Wisp, use Stealth Rock;
If it switches into Honchkrow, switch into Metagross and use Thunder Punch. Switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance.
If it switches into Krookodile, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance.
If it switches into Krookodile, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance.
Switch into Blissey to tank Final Gambit. Switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed. Heal Chandelure when Sandstorm is over. If Kingambit is sent out last, switch into Poliwrath and use Drain Punch.
Use Trick;
If it uses Close Combat, switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Blissey, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Togekiss, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Togekiss, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch into the second Metagross then use Trick and use Earthquake, forcing Caitlin to switch into Emolga. Switch into Excadrill then switch into the Metagross without an Air Balloon to bait out Caitlin's Metagross Earthquake. Switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Fire Blast, switch into Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Flamethrower, use Stealth Rock and then switch into Chandelr 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Entei, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Softboiled until it switches out into Entei, then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick.

If it switches back to Umbreon, use Trick again then switch to Poliwrath and use Drain Punch to kill. It will send out Mienshao, so switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill. Out comes Entei, so switch into the Metagross with Choice Scarf and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Entei / Altaria, switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Flamethrower, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Togekiss, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Togekiss, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Earthquake, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Emolga, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Serperior, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, and use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed. (Use Energy Ball vs Snorlax);
If it switches into Mienshao, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross. Switch back into Chandelure, then switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Sigilyph, switch into Chandelure, then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.

If it switches out into Metagross, switch to your own second Metagross and use Trick, then use Earthquake. Switch into Excadrill then switch into the Metagross without an Air Balloon to bait out Earthquake from Caitlin's Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches out into Serperior, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Earthquake, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it uses Surf,  use Stealth Rock, then switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.

If it switches into Emolga, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch to the second Metagross and use Trick, then use Earthquake. Switch into Excadrill then switch into any Metagross to bait out Earthquake from Caitlin's Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If you get Focus Sash, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If you get Life Orb, switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed. (Entei must use Sacred Fire on Chandelure)
If it switches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it switches into Emolga, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick, then use Earthquake. Switch into Excadrill then switch into any Metagross to bait out Earthquake from Caitlin's Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Sacred Sword, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend.
If it switches into Serperior, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 6x Calm Mind.
Switch into Blissey, then switch into Metagross and use Trick.
If it switches into Emolga, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Serperior, switch into Blissey again and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed.
If Metagross uses Hammer Arm, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If Metagross switches out, switch into Blissey again and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If Gallade uses Sacred Sword, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend.
If it switches into Serperior, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Thunderbolt, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Reuniclus, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Leaf Blade, use Stealth Rock;
If it stays, switch into Chandelure, then use Flamethrower to kill. Switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it switches into Emolga, switch into Excadrill then switch into Metagross. Switch into Chandelure then use Flamethrower to kill. Switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Entei, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it switches into Emolga, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick, then use Earthquake. Switch into Excadrill then switch into any Metagross to bait out Earthquake from Caitlin's Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
If it uses Earthquake;
and you get Air Baloon, use Stealth Rock.
If it switches into Emolga, switch into Excadrill, then switch into the second Metagross;
If Emolga stays, use Trick then switch into Excadrill, then switch into any Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.

If it switches into Metagross, switch into Excadrill then switch into the scarfed Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill then switch into any Metagross to bait Caitlin's Metagross to use Earthquake.
If it switches into Entei, switch into Chandelure, then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get Choice Scarf, switch into Excadrill: 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
and you get Life Orb, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Hammer Arm;
and you get Choice Scarf, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. (Use Energy Ball vs. Snorlax)
If Snorlax switches in while you switch into Chandelure, switch into Blissey and use Trick;
If it stays, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Mienshao, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed. Use Healing Items if necessary.
If Snorlax switches in while you set up Stealth Rock, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Blissey and use Trick.
If it stays, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Mienshao, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed. Use Healing Items if necessary.
and you get Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it swiches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into anything else, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Altaria, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Entei, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey then use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Emolga, switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Serperior, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Serperior;
and you get Leftovers, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
and you get Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Reuniclus, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Vaporeon, switch into Poliwrath then switch into Metagross. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Snorlax, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure. Switch into Metagross then switch back into Chandelure. Switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Staraptor, switch into Chandelure 6x Calm Mind.

If it switches into Umbreon, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Softboiled then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch into Chandelure;
If it stays, switch into Metagross and use Stealth Rock;
If it still stays, switch back into Chandelure, then use Shadow Ball. Switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch once more into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Altaria, switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it switches into Umbreon, switch into Poliwrath and use Drain Punch. Switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Proect then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it uses Body Slam, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it switches into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Protect then use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure then switch into the Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it uses Hydro Pump, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it uses Scald, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Conkeldurr, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Volcarona, switch into Blissey, then switch into second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Latios, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Sandslash, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch into Blissey and use Stealth Rock.
If it says, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Conkeldurr, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Archeops, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Bouffalant, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it switches into Conkeldurr, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches out into Vaporen, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Escavalier, switch into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Excadrill, switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into your own Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If it doesn't get damaged by Life Or
If Excadrill is sent out, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into your own Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If Lucario is sent out, use Stealth Rock again and see what happens:
If it uses Close Combat, send in Metagross and use Trick.
If it stays, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it switches into Dragonite, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

If it uses Crunch / Extreme Speed, switch into Metagross, then switch into Chandelure. Switch into Metagross, then switch into Chandelure, then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If it uses Meteor Smash, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If Lucario got an attack boost from Meteor Smash, switch into Chandelure and then use Flamethrower to kill. Switch into Metagross and use Trick.
If Braviary used Close Combat, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If Sandslash used Earthquake, switch into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
If Vaporeon used Hydro Pump, switch into Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
If it switches into Reuniclus, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
